Case.NameCase: E011-01 INTEGER and SMALLINT data types
Case.Query1: Create table IntegerData (INTD1 INTEGER,INTD2 INTEGER,INTD3 INTEGER,Primary key(INTD1))
Case.Query3: Create table SmallintData (SMINTD1 SMALLINT,SMINTD2 SMALLINT,SMINTD3 SMALLINT,Primary key(SMINTD1))

Case.NameCase: E011-02 REAL, DOUBLE PRECISION and FLOAT data types
Case.Query1: Create table RealData (REALD1 REAL(10),REALD2 REAL(4),REALD3 REAL(8),Primary key(REALD1))
Case.Query3: Create table DoubleData (DOUBLEP1 DOUBLE PRECISION,DOUBLEP2 DOUBLE PRECISION,DOUBLEP3 DOUBLE PRECISION,Primary key(DOUBLEP1))
Case.Query5: Create table FloatData (FLOAT1 FLOAT(10),FLOAT2 FLOAT(4),FLOAT3 FLOAT(8),Primary key(FLOAT1))

Case.NameCase: E011-03 DECIMAL and NUMERIC data types
Case.Query1: Create table NumericData (NUMD1 NUMERIC(10,5),NUMD2 NUMERIC(4,2),NUMD3 NUMERIC(9,4),Primary key(NUMD1))
Case.Query3: Create table DecimalData (DEC1 DECIMAL(10,5),DEC2 DECIMAL(4,2),DEC3 DECIMAL(9,4),Primary key(DEC1))

Case.NameCase: E011-06 Implicit casting among the numeric data types
Case.Query1: Create table ImplicitCasting (CHARD CHAR(3), DOUBLEP DOUBLE PRECISION(10,2),INTD INTEGER,Primary key(CHARD))
